lyrics.line: When the line froze, what did I see?A bad mother fucker standing next to meWith his eyes closed, told he can't seeTryna follow orders, just gone and be freeBe free like a bird so today I'ma flyBad, bad motherfucker 'til the day I dieBe free like a bird so today I'ma flyBad, bad motherfucker 'til the day I dieYeah, bad (bad)Mother (fucker)'Til the (day)I (die)I'm a Bad Brains, Bruce Wayne in the fast laneCouple Js in the ash tray, style motherfuckerTattoo'd back, man see the rap nameTake a bath in the champagne, wild motherfuckerStraight from the block, dawg, ducking shots walking to the storeDollar for a Black & Mild, motherfuckerBlew up as a rockstar so I'm top floorThrowing drinks on a cop car, foul motherfuckerThe only number calling up my phoneIs from my dealer, swear that dude won't leave me aloneCause he know when I pick up, I'ma cop a couple zonesAnd my girl know I ain't fuckin' 'til she roll me up a coneI be keeping freaks in the home, yeahApolloniaGold teeth like the NoliaKeep 'em on, yeahI be rolling stoned, yeahI should be on the cover with my middle fingerWhen the line froze, what did I see?A bad mother fucker standing next to meWith his eyes closed, told he can't seeTryna follow orders, just gone and be freeBe free like a bird so today I'ma flyBad, bad motherfucker 'til the day I dieBe free like a bird so today I'ma flyBad, bad motherfucker 'til the day I dieYeah, bad (bad)Mother (fucker)Kid Rock, that's a bad motherfuckerYoung Kells, that's a bad motherfucker (oh shit)Detroit, y'all some bad motherfuckersCleveland, y'all some bad motherfuckersOkay I'm reaching in my pocketGot a condom and a hundred dollar bill (uh)I can snort a rock or I can spend it on a pill (uh)I be with some models that just flew in from BrazilAnd they give me pussy 365 days a year (bitch)I'm the type to never go to sleepI'm the type to break a couple motherfuckers' teethI'm the type to drop a hit of acid on the beach
